section.title: CentOS Studio Overview
section.para: CentOS Studio provides a standard platform for building desktop and server solutions based on CentOS, a stable, free and widely adopted version of Linux. CentOS Studio packages installation images, software and configuration into standard deployment bundles, called solutions. Solutions can be used to test, install and maintain client machines in a wide range of IT environments - physical, virtual and cloud.
Using CentOS Studio you can create and maintain solutions:

listitem.para: select a CentOS-compatible repository and additional package repositories,

section.para: CentOS Studio reads a solution definition, gathers input (installation images, software packages, and configuration files), and creates a solution. Using the solution, you can test, deploy and update client machines.

In summary, CentOS Studio is a production life cycle manager for use in defining, building, testing, deploying and maintaining solutions that can be easily installed and updated on physical, virtual and cloud machines.
